ITTIA DB IoT C API Reference  8.4.1
Modules | Data Structures | Macros | Typedefs
Data Types
C API

Like most database systems, ITTIA DB allows constraints to be put on data stored in the database. More...

Modules

 Time Series
 ITTIA DB provides a timestamp data type for annotating time dependent values or sensor readings to create a time series data type.

Macros

#define DB_COLTYPE_IS_UTFSTR(a)   (a == DB_COLTYPE_UTF8STR || a == DB_COLTYPE_UTF16STR || a == DB_COLTYPE_UTF32STR)
 Evaluates to true if the given column type is any UTF-encoded type.

Detailed Description

Like most database systems, ITTIA DB allows constraints to be put on data stored in the database.

Each column in a table is restricted to contain only a specific type of data, such as a number or a string of text.

Macro Definition Documentation

◆ DB_COLTYPE_WCHARSTR

#define DB_COLTYPE_WCHARSTR   (sizeof(wchar_t) == sizeof(db_utf16_t) ? DB_COLTYPE_UTF16STR : DB_COLTYPE_UTF32STR)

Evaluates to the column type that matches wchar_t on this platform.

Note
Use of this macro on a platform that does not support wchar_t will result in a compile error.
See also
db_coltype_t, DB_COLTYPE_UTF16STR, DB_COLTYPE_UTF32STR

◆ DB_VARTYPE_WCHARSTR

#define DB_VARTYPE_WCHARSTR   (sizeof(wchar_t) == sizeof(db_utf16_t) ? DB_VARTYPE_UTF16STR : DB_VARTYPE_UTF32STR)

Evaluates to the variable type that matches wchar_t on this platform.

Note
Use of this macro on a platform that does not support wchar_t will result in a compile error.
See also
db_vartype_t, DB_VARTYPE_UTF16STR, DB_VARTYPE_UTF32STR
